title: Population of Michigan , by race and ethnicity 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of residents for 8 number of Races.
The maximum Number of residents 7476047.0 is found at Race White alone and the minimum is found at Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone where Race is 3290.0.
The highest Race White alone has 7472757.0 more Number of residents than the lowest Race Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of residents for 8 number of Races.

mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of residents for 8 number of Races.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of residents in the y axis.
The maximum Number of residents 7476047.0 is found at Race White alone and the minimum is found at Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone where Race is 3290.0.
The second highest Number of residents is appeared to be the Race Black or African American alone.
The highest Race White alone has 7472757.0 more Number of residents than the lowest Race Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone.
Number of residents at Race White alone is 7476047.0 , second place is Black or African American alone at 1363183.0, and thirdly is Hispanic or Latino (of any race) at 517381.0.
The Race Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone tends to be 5.98 percent lower than average.
The Number of residents is 9995915.0 if we add up values of all Races.
